name: Capture the monster
description:
Playing "Capture the monster" brings you lots of fun as well as great challenge.

The goal of the game is capture the maximum of monsters as you can, to capture to the monster you have draw lines on the screen such way that the enemies can’t move.
For each enemy you capture you earn extra time and line to draw,aditional monsters will spawn randomly.

There are 3 ways to lose the game:

-Running out of time.

-Running out of drawing lines.

-Getting five enemies at the same time.

How to play:

-Left mouse click to draw lines
